data_table.description: Sample ID, body site where sample was collected, analyte type, histological type of cancer, and tumor status of samples obtained from participants with or without tobacco use disorder and involved in the "CIDR, NCI, NIDA Sequencing of Targeted Genomic Regions Associated with Smoking" project.

variable.name: BODY_SITE
variable.description: Body site where sample was collected

variable.name: HISTOLOGICAL_TYPE
variable.description: Cell or tissue type or subtype of sample
